channel.title: Grabbed by the Monads
channel.description: If (like me) you are slowly getting hooked on MSH (or Monad), the James Manning’s latest post will interest you – an early implementation of a MSH Provider for Team Foundation Server Version Control allowing you to access the repository as if...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Mike C+00:00
item.description: Scott Hanselman has done a great intro into this topic on his weekly podcast, Hanselminutes. Check Out http://www.hanselminutes.com/default.aspx?showID=12
